ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ سَبَبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] مَكَّنَّا [[We] established] لَهُۥ [[for] him] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ [and We gave him] مِن [of] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] سَبَبًۭا [a means]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna makkanna lahu fee al-ardiwaataynahu min kulli shay-in sababa

ayahs.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغْرِبَ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغْرُبُ فِى عَيْنٍ حَمِئَةٍ وَوَجَدَ عِندَهَا قَوْمًا ۗ قُلْنَا يَـٰذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ إِمَّآ أَن تُعَذِّبَ وَإِمَّآ أَن تَتَّخِذَ فِيهِمْ حُسْنًا
ayahs.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] بَلَغَ [he reached] مَغْرِبَ [(the) setting place] ٱلشَّمْسِ [(of) the sun] وَجَدَهَا [he found it] تَغْرُبُ [setting] فِى [in] عَيْنٍ [a spring] حَمِئَةٍۢ [(of) dark mud] وَوَجَدَ [and he found] عِندَهَا [near it] قَوْمًۭا ۗ [a community] قُلْنَا [We said] يَـٰذَا [O Dhul-qarnain] ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ [O Dhul-qarnain] إِمَّآ [Either] أَن [[that]] تُعَذِّبَ [you punish] وَإِمَّآ [or] أَن [[that]] تَتَّخِذَ [you take] فِيهِمْ [[in] them] حُسْنًۭا [(with) goodness]
ayahs.transliteration: Hatta itha balaghamaghriba ashshamsi wajadaha taghrubu fee AAaynin hami-atinwawajada AAindaha qawman qulna ya thaalqarnayni imma an tuAAaththiba wa-imma antattakhitha feehim husna

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوْفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابًا نُّكْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَمَّا [As for] مَن [(one) who] ظَلَمَ [wrongs] فَسَوْفَ [then soon] نُعَذِّبُهُۥ [we will punish him] ثُمَّ [Then] يُرَدُّ [he will be returned] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّهِۦ [his Lord] فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ [and He will punish him] عَذَابًۭا [(with) a punishment] نُّكْرًۭا [terrible]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala amma man thalamafasawfa nuAAaththibuhu thumma yuraddu ila rabbihifayuAAaththibuhu AAathaban nukra

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنْ أَمْرِنَا يُسْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَمَّا [But as for] مَنْ [(one) who] ءَامَنَ [believes] وَعَمِلَ [and does] صَـٰلِحًۭا [righteous (deeds)] فَلَهُۥ [then for him] جَزَآءً [(is) a reward] ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ [good] وَسَنَقُولُ [And we will speak] لَهُۥ [to him] مِنْ [from] أَمْرِنَا [our command] يُسْرًۭا [(with) ease]
ayahs.transliteration: Waamma man amana waAAamila salihanfalahu jazaan alhusna wasanaqoolu lahu minamrina yusra

ayahs.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَطْلِعَ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَجَدَهَا تَطْلُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍ لَّمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُم مِّن دُونِهَا سِتْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] بَلَغَ [he reached] مَطْلِعَ [(the) rising place] ٱلشَّمْسِ [(of) the sun] وَجَدَهَا [and he found it] تَطْلُعُ [rising] عَلَىٰ [on] قَوْمٍۢ [a community] لَّمْ [not] نَجْعَل [We made] لَّهُم [for them] مِّن [against it] دُونِهَا [against it] سِتْرًۭا [any shelter]
ayahs.transliteration: Hatta itha balagha matliAAaashshamsi wajadaha tatluAAu AAalaqawmin lam najAAal lahum min dooniha sitra

ayahs.textUthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ وَقَدْ أَحَطْنَا بِمَا لَدَيْهِ خُبْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: كَذَٰلِكَ [Thus] وَقَدْ [And verily] أَحَطْنَا [We encompassed] بِمَا [of what] لَدَيْهِ [(was) with him] خُبْرًۭا [(of the) information]

ayahs.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيْنَ ٱلسَّدَّيْنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوْمًا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفْقَهُونَ قَوْلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] بَلَغَ [he reached] بَيْنَ [between] ٱلسَّدَّيْنِ [the two mountains] وَجَدَ [he found] مِن [besides them] دُونِهِمَا [besides them] قَوْمًۭا [a community] لَّا [not] يَكَادُونَ [who would almost] يَفْقَهُونَ [understand] قَوْلًۭا [(his) speech]
ayahs.transliteration: Hatta itha balaghabayna assaddayni wajada min doonihima qawman layakadoona yafqahoona qawla

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰذَا ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ إِنَّ يَأْجُوجَ وَمَأْجُوجَ مُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَهَلْ نَجْعَلُ لَكَ خَرْجًا عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَجْعَلَ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَهُمْ سَدًّا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] يَـٰذَا [O Dhul-qarnain] ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ [O Dhul-qarnain] إِنَّ [Indeed] يَأْجُوجَ [Yajuj] وَمَأْجُوجَ [and Majuj] مُفْسِدُونَ [(are) corrupters] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the land] فَهَلْ [So may] نَجْعَلُ [we make] لَكَ [for you] خَرْجًا [an expenditure] عَلَىٰٓ [[on]] أَن [that] تَجْعَلَ [you make] بَيْنَنَا [between us] وَبَيْنَهُمْ [and between them] سَدًّۭا [a barrier]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo ya tha alqarnayniinna ya/jooja wama/jooja mufsidoona fee al-ardi fahalnajAAalu laka kharjan AAala an tajAAala baynanawabaynahum sadda

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّى فِيهِ رَبِّى خَيْرٌ فَأَعِينُونِى بِقُوَّةٍ أَجْعَلْ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُمْ رَدْمًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] مَا [What] مَكَّنِّى [has established me] فِيهِ [[in it]] رَبِّى [my Lord] خَيْرٌۭ [(is) better] فَأَعِينُونِى [but assist me] بِقُوَّةٍ [with strength] أَجْعَلْ [I will make] بَيْنَكُمْ [between you] وَبَيْنَهُمْ [and between them] رَدْمًا [a barrier]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala ma makkannee feehi rabbeekhayrun faaAAeenoonee biquwwatin ajAAal baynakum wabaynahum radma

ayahs.textUthmani: ءَاتُونِى زُبَرَ ٱلْحَدِيدِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا سَاوَىٰ بَيْنَ ٱلصَّدَفَيْنِ قَالَ ٱنفُخُوا۟ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَعَلَهُۥ نَارًا قَالَ ءَاتُونِىٓ أُفْرِغْ عَلَيْهِ قِطْرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: ءَاتُونِى [Bring me] زُبَرَ [sheets] ٱلْحَدِيدِ ۖ [(of) iron] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] إِذَا [when] سَاوَىٰ [he (had) leveled] بَيْنَ [between] ٱلصَّدَفَيْنِ [the two cliffs] قَالَ [he said] ٱنفُخُوا۟ ۖ [Blow] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] إِذَا [when] جَعَلَهُۥ [he made it] نَارًۭا [fire] قَالَ [he said] ءَاتُونِىٓ [Bring me] أُفْرِغْ [I pour] عَلَيْهِ [over it] قِطْرًۭا [molten copper]
ayahs.transliteration: Atoonee zubara alhadeedi hattaitha sawa bayna asadafayni qalaonfukhoo hatta itha jaAAalahu naran qalaatoonee ofrigh AAalayhi qitra

ayahs.textUthmani: فَمَا ٱسْطَـٰعُوٓا۟ أَن يَظْهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ لَهُۥ نَقْبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَمَا [So not] ٱسْطَـٰعُوٓا۟ [they were able] أَن [to] يَظْهَرُوهُ [scale it] وَمَا [and not] ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ [they were able] لَهُۥ [in it] نَقْبًۭا [(to do) any penetration]
ayahs.transliteration: Fama istaAAoo an yathharoohuwama istataAAoo lahu naqba
